1659130.name: Юхины Кошмары Demo
1659130.description:
Plunge into Yuha's dreams in this nightmare simulator and live through her feelings and traumas. Collect artifacts, memories and sounds to put her story together. A game based on the real dreams of developer Yuliya Kozhemyako, Yuha's waking-life alter ego.

A playable nightmare

The game drops you into eerie but familiar dreamscapes: apocalypse, returning to a childhood home, disappearing staircases, sluggish limbs, losing your voice, everything a storm. Don't just observe the dream. Play the dream.

The flip side of 3D worlds

Explore Yuha’s unconscious by accessing the Wireframe World: the invisible, digital architecture underpinning many games. Look through walls, see how levels are built and uncover the secrets lodged both deep in the game and in Yuha's mind.

The glitch in the dream

Glitches can be found across the dreamscape. Your field of view shifts and what you see won't always match what you feel. You can get stuck in the surfaces, but there’s always a way out.

In the demo, you will experience several of Yuha’s dreams from the very beginning of the “Catastrophe” episode.

If you enjoyed the demo, wishlist the full game.
1659130.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
